description:
Take charge of your finances - take charge of your life!

Are you suffering under the weight of out of control debt?

Join Over 50 students like you who joined in the first 24hrs!

This practical step by step plan will give you the tools to take charge of your money and eliminate debt (and potentially your Mortgage*) in as little as 5-7 years. **

This is not a trick or debt management scheme that will ruin your credit rating, but rather a mathematically proven method to eliminate your debts and put you back in control of your money and your life.

Imagine the relief from stress and worry when you have paid off your credit cards and loans for good.

Course contents include clear, step by step videos, worked examples and downloadable templates as spreadsheet files or PDF.

Study in the privacy of your own home at your own pace.

You too can become debt free. If you have the will - this is the way.

* Not all mortgages / homeloans can accept overpayment. Please check with your provider

** Actual results will depend on your personal financial circumstances
title: Dissolve Your Debt - A Step By Step Plan To Become Debt Free
